name: MDBList
description: Get Movies and TV Shows data with ratings from multiple providers in JSON format

api_methods.name: Search by Title
api_methods.description: Search for Movies or TV Shows by title, include option year or mediatype filter to narrow your results

parameters.name: s
parameters.description: Movie or TV Show Title to search

parameters.name: l
parameters.description:
Limit returned items.
You can use numbes from 1 to 100 (default is 50)

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: Year (format YYYY, for example 2020) to limit title search (would also include previous and next year movies)

parameters.name: m
parameters.description: Search for only movie or tv show, leave empty for both
